document_data.name: Serinia
document_data.mainbody: '''Serinia''' was a priestess of [[Mielikki]] and a member of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in [[Elventree]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Herald of the Moon|8-9}}
document_data.Activities: Serinia took care of the [[Hall of the Unicorn]], the local temple to Mielikki.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], she helped [[Elanil Elassidil]] to bring peace to the spirit of her ancestor, [[Meira Faerenduil]]. At the same time, she was worried about her friend, the [[treant]] [[Brightleaf]], who had sent no news for a while.
document_data.Personality: Serinia was a nervous individual. She did not like the company of other people, preferring to spend time with small animals.
document_data.Relationship: Serinia had good dealings with Elanil Elassidil, the [[Heralds (local)|Herald]] of Elventree.
